oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A SIMPLE METHOD TO PREDICT LONG-TERM MORPHOLOGICAL CHANGES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Roelvink, Dano
Boutmy, Alain
Stam, Jean-Marie
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: morphology
change prediction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A method is presented to obtain a first estimate of long-term bathymetric changes based on an initial transport field obtained from a 2DH process model. The results are compared with full morphodynamic simulations and measured bottom developments after extension of the harbour moles at Umuiden, the Netherlands.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 26 (1998): Proceedings of 26th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Copenhagen, Denmark, 1998.
